[22] pahaaya na punaayanti, ima.m loka.m kudaacana''nti..
[03] ayampi attho vutto bhagavataa, iti me sutanti. pa.thama.m.

[03] ``sabba.m, bhikkhave, anabhijaana.m aparijaana.m tattha citta.m aviraajaya.m appajaha.m abhabbo dukkhakkhayaaya. sabba~nca kho, bhikkhave, abhijaana.m parijaana.m ^a^P0.0004^ea^ tattha citta.m viraajaya.m pajaha.m bhabbo dukkhakkhayaayaa''ti. etamattha.m bhagavaa avoca. tattheta.m iti vuccati --
[22] sa ve sabbapari~n~naa {sabba.m pari~n~naa (syaa0 pii0)} so, sabbadukkhamupaccagaa''ti {sabba.m dukkha.m upaccagaati (syaa0), sabbadukkha.m upaccagaati (pii0 a.t.tha0)}..
[03] ayampi attho vutto bhagavataa, iti me sutanti. sattama.m.

[22] te maanaganthaabhibhuno, sabbadukkhamupaccagu''nti {sabbadukkha.m upaccagunti (pii0), sabba.m dukkha.m upaccagunti (a.t.thakathaa)}..
[03] ayampi attho vutto bhagavataa, iti me sutanti. a.t.thama.m.

[22] pahaaya na punaayanti, ima.m loka.m kudaacana''nti..
[03] ayampi attho vutto bhagavataa, iti me sutanti. navama.m.

[22] pahaaya na punaayanti, ima.m loka.m kudaacana''nti..
[03] ayampi attho vutto bhagavataa, iti me sutanti. dasama.m.
[21] raagadosaa atha moho, kodhamakkhaa ^a^T0.0234^ea^ maana.m sabba.m.
[22] maanato raagadosaa puna dve, pakaasitaa vaggamaahu pa.thamanti..

[03] ``moha.m, bhikkhave, anabhijaana.m aparijaana.m tattha citta.m aviraajaya.m appajaha.m abhabbo dukkhakkhayaaya. moha~nca kho, bhikkhave, abhijaana.m parijaana.m tattha citta.m viraajaya.m pajaha.m bhabbo dukkhakkhayaayaa''ti. etamattha.m bhagavaa avoca. tattheta.m iti vuccati --
[22] pahaaya ^a^P0.0007^ea^ na punaayanti, ima.m loka.m kudaacana''nti..
[03] ayampi attho vutto bhagavataa, iti me sutanti. pa.thama.m.

[22] pahaaya na punaayanti, ima.m loka.m kudaacana''nti..
[03] ayampi attho vutto bhagavataa, iti me sutanti. dutiya.m.

[22] pahaaya na punaayanti, ima.m loka.m kudaacana''nti..
[03] ayampi attho vutto bhagavataa, iti me sutanti. tatiya.m.

[03] ``naaha.m, bhikkhave, a~n~na.m ekaniivara.nampi samanupassaami yena {yeneva.m (?)} niivara.nena nivutaa pajaa diigharatta.m ^a^V0.0008^ea^ sandhaavanti sa.msaranti yathayida.m, bhikkhave, avijjaaniivara.na.m {avijjaaniivara.nena (?)}. avijjaaniivara.nena hi, bhikkhave, nivutaa pajaa diigharatta.m sandhaavanti sa.msarantii''ti. etamattha.m bhagavaa avoca. tattheta.m iti vuccati --
[21] ``nattha~n~no ^a^M0.0201^ea^ ekadhammopi, yeneva.m {yeneva (sii0 pii0 ka0)} nivutaa pajaa.
[21] ``ye ca moha.m pahantvaana, tamokhandha.m {tamokkhandha.m (sii0 syaa0 pii0)} padaalayu.m.
[22] na te puna sa.msaranti, hetu tesa.m na vijjatii''ti..
[03] ayampi attho vutto bhagavataa, iti me sutanti. catuttha.m.

[03] ``naaha.m, bhikkhave, a~n~na.m ekasa.myojanampi samanupassaami yena {yeneva.m (syaa0)} sa.myojanena sa.myuttaa sattaa diigharatta.m sandhaavanti sa.msaranti yathayida.m, bhikkhave, ta.nhaasa.myojana.m {ta.nhaasa.myojanena (?)}. ta.nhaasa.myojanena hi, bhikkhave, sa.myuttaa sattaa diigharatta.m sandhaavanti sa.msarantii''ti. etamattha.m bhagavaa avoca. tattheta.m iti vuccati --
[21] ``etamaadiinava.m {evamaadiinava.m (sii0 pii0 ka0)} ~natvaa, ta.nha.m {ta.nhaa (sii0 ka0)} dukkhassa sambhava.m.
[03] ayampi attho vutto bhagavataa, iti me sutanti. pa~ncama.m.

[03] ``sekhassa, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno appattamaanasassa anuttara.m yogakkhema.m patthayamaanassa viharato ajjhattika.m a"nganti karitvaa naa~n~na.m eka"ngampi samanupassaami ya.m eva.m bahuupakaara.m yathayida.m, bhikkhave, yoniso manasikaaro. yoniso, bhikkhave, bhikkhu manasi karonto akusala.m pajahati ^a^M0.0202^ea^, kusala.m bhaavetii''ti ^a^T0.0237^ea^. etamattha.m bhagavaa avoca. tattheta.m iti vuccati --
[22] yoniso padaha.m bhikkhu, khaya.m dukkhassa paapu.ne''ti..
[03] ayampi attho vutto bhagavataa, iti me sutanti. cha.t.tha.m.

[03] ``sekhassa, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno appattamaanasassa anuttara.m yogakkhema.m patthayamaanassa viharato baahira.m a"nganti karitvaa naa~n~na.m eka"ngampi samanupassaami ya.m eva.m bahuupakaara.m yathayida.m, bhikkhave, kalyaa.namittataa. kalyaa.namitto, bhikkhave, bhikkhu akusala.m pajahati, kusala.m bhaavetii''ti. etamattha.m bhagavaa avoca. tattheta.m iti vuccati --
[03] ayampi attho vutto bhagavataa, iti me sutanti. sattama.m.

[03] ``ekadhammo, bhikkhave, loke uppajjamaano ^a^P0.0011^ea^ uppajjati bahujanaahitaaya bahujanaasukhaaya bahuno janassa anatthaaya ahitaaya dukkhaaya devamanussaana.m. katamo ekadhammo? sa"nghabhedo. sa"nghe kho pana, bhikkhave, bhinne a~n~nama~n~na.m bha.n.danaani ceva honti, a~n~nama~n~na.m paribhaasaa ca honti ^a^T0.0238^ea^, a~n~nama~n~na.m parikkhepaa ca honti, a~n~nama~n~na.m pariccajanaa ca honti. tattha appasannaa ceva nappasiidanti, pasannaana~nca ekaccaana.m a~n~nathatta.m hotii''ti. etamattha.m bhagavaa avoca. tattheta.m iti vuccati --
[27] vaggaaraamo adhamma.t.tho, yogakkhemaa padha.msati {yogakkhemato dha.msati (syaa0 pii0), yogakkhemaa vima.msati (sii0 ka0)}.
[22] sa"ngha.m samagga.m bhetvaana {bhitvaana (sii0 ka0), bhinditvaa (cuu.lava0 354; a0 ni0 10.39)}, kappa.m nirayamhi paccatii''ti..
[03] ayampi attho vutto bhagavataa, iti me sutanti. a.t.thama.m.

[03] ``ekadhammo, bhikkhave, loke uppajjamaano uppajjati bahujanahitaaya bahujanasukhaaya bahuno janassa atthaaya hitaaya sukhaaya devamanussaana.m. katamo ekadhammo ^a^P0.0012^ea^? sa"nghasaamaggii. sa"nghe kho pana, bhikkhave, samagge na ceva a~n~nama~n~na.m bha.n.danaani honti, na ca a~n~nama~n~na.m paribhaasaa honti, na ca a~n~nama~n~na.m parikkhepaa honti, na ca a~n~nama~n~na.m pariccajanaa honti. tattha appasannaa ceva pasiidanti, pasannaana~nca bhiyyobhaavo hotii''ti. etamattha.m bhagavaa avoca. tattheta.m iti vuccati --
[22] sa"ngha.m samagga.m katvaana, kappa.m saggamhi modatii''ti..
[03] ayampi ^a^V0.0011^ea^ attho vutto bhagavataa, iti me sutanti. navama.m.

[03] ``idhaaha.m, bhikkhave, ekacca.m puggala.m padu.t.thacitta.m eva.m cetasaa ceto paricca pajaanaami -- `imamhi caaya.m samaye puggalo kaala"nkareyya yathaabhata.m nikkhitto eva.m niraye'. ta.m kissa hetu? citta.m hissa, bhikkhave, padu.t.tha.m. cetopadosahetu kho pana, bhikkhave, evamidhekacce sattaa kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa apaaya.m duggati.m vinipaata.m niraya.m upapajjantii''ti. etamattha.m bhagavaa avoca. tattheta.m iti vuccati --
[03] ayampi attho vutto bhagavataa, iti me sutanti. dasama.m.
[21] moho kodho atha makkho, vijjaa ta.nhaa sekhaduve ca.

[22] bhedo saamaggipuggalo {mohakodha atha makkhaagato, muuhaa kaamasekkhaduve. bhedasaamaggapuggalo ca (sii0 ka0) mohakodhaa atha makkho mohakaamaa sekkhaa duve. bhedamodaa puggalo ca (syaa0 pii0)}, vaggamaahu dutiyanti vuccatiiti..

[03] ``idhaaha.m, bhikkhave, ekacca.m puggala.m pasannacitta.m eva.m cetasaa ceto paricca pajaanaami ^a^P0.0014^ea^ -- `imamhi caaya.m samaye puggalo kaala.m kareyya yathaabhata.m nikkhitto eva.m sagge'. ta.m kissa hetu? citta.m hissa, bhikkhave, pasanna.m. cetopasaadahetu kho pana, bhikkhave, evamidhekacce sattaa kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa sugati.m sagga.m loka.m upapajjantii''ti. etamattha.m bhagavaa avoca. tattheta.m iti vuccati --
[03] ayampi attho vutto bhagavataa, iti me sutanti. pa.thama.m.

[03] ``maa, bhikkhave, pu~n~naana.m bhaayittha ^a^P0.0015^ea^. sukhasseta.m, bhikkhave, adhivacana.m i.t.thassa kantassa piyassa manaapassa yadida.m pu~n~naani {pu~n~naananti, (a0 ni0 7.62)}. abhijaanaami kho panaaha.m, bhikkhave, diigharatta.m kataana.m pu~n~naana.m i.t.tha.m kanta.m piya.m manaapa.m vipaaka.m paccanubhuuta.m. satta vassaani mettacitta.m bhaavetvaa satta ^a^T0.0241^ea^ sa.mva.t.taviva.t.takappe ^a^V0.0013^ea^ nayima.m loka.m punaraagamaasi.m. sa.mva.t.tamaane suda.m, bhikkhave, kappe aabhassaruupago homi; viva.t.tamaane kappe su~n~na.m brahmavimaana.m upapajjaami.

[03] ``tatra suda.m, bhikkhave, brahmaa homi mahaabrahmaa abhibhuu anabhibhuuto a~n~nadatthudaso vasavattii. chatti.msakkhattu.m kho panaaha.m, bhikkhave, sakko ahosi.m devaanamindo; anekasatakkhattu.m raajaa ahosi.m cakkavattii dhammiko dhammaraajaa caaturanto vijitaavii janapadatthaavariyappatto sattaratanasamannaagato. ko pana vaado padesarajjassa!

[03] ``tassa mayha.m, bhikkhave, etadahosi -- `kissa nu kho me ida.m kammassa phala.m, kissa kammassa vipaako, yenaaha.m etarahi eva.mmahiddhiko eva.mmahaanubhaavo'ti? tassa mayha.m, bhikkhave, etadahosi -- `ti.n.na.m kho me ida.m kammaana.m phala.m, ti.n.na.m kammaana.m vipaako, yenaaha.m etarahi eva.mmahiddhiko eva.mmahaanubhaavoti, seyyathida.m {seyyathiida.m (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} -- daanassa, damassa, sa~n~namassaa'''ti. etamattha.m bhagavaa avoca. tattheta.m iti vuccati --
[22] abyaapajjha.m {abyaapajja.m (syaa0 ka0), abyaabajjha.m (?)} sukha.m loka.m, pa.n.dito upapajjatii''ti..
[03] ayampi attho vutto bhagavataa, iti me sutanti. dutiya.m.

[03] ``ekadhammo ^a^T0.0242^ea^, bhikkhave, bhaavito bahuliikato ubho atthe samadhigayha ti.t.thati -- di.t.thadhammika~nceva attha.m samparaayika~nca. katamo ekadhammo? appamaado kusalesu dhammesu. aya.m kho, bhikkhave, ekadhammo bhaavito bahuliikato ubho atthe samadhigayha ti.t.thati -- di.t.thadhammika~nceva attha.m samparaayika~ncaa''ti. etamattha.m bhagavaa avoca. tattheta.m iti vuccati --
[21] ``di.t.the ^a^P0.0017^ea^ dhamme ca yo attho, yo cattho samparaayiko.
[03] ayampi attho vutto bhagavataa, iti me sutanti. tatiya.m.

[03] ``ekapuggalassa, bhikkhave, kappa.m sandhaavato sa.msarato siyaa eva.m mahaa a.t.thika"nkalo a.t.thipu~njo a.t.thiraasi yathaaya.m vepullo pabbato: sace sa.mhaarako assa, sambhata~nca na vinasseyyaa''ti. etamattha.m bhagavaa avoca. tattheta.m iti vuccati --
[22] siyaa pabbatasamo raasi, iti vutta.m mahesinaa..
[21] ``so kho panaaya.m akkhaato, vepullo pabbato mahaa.
[03] ayampi attho vutto bhagavataa, iti me sutanti. catuttha.m.

[03] ``ekadhamma.m atiitassa, bhikkhave, purisapuggalassa naaha.m tassa ki~nci paapakamma.m akara.niiyanti vadaami. katama.m ekadhamma.m? yadida.m {yathayida.m (sii0 syaa0 ka0), yathaayida.m (pii0)} bhikkhave, sampajaanamusaavaado''ti. etamattha.m bhagavaa avoca. tattheta.m iti vuccati --
[03] ayampi attho vutto bhagavataa, iti me sutanti. pa~ncama.m.

[03] ``eva~nce, bhikkhave, sattaa jaaneyyu.m daanasa.mvibhaagassa vipaaka.m yathaaha.m jaanaami, na adatvaa bhu~njeyyu.m, na ca nesa.m maccheramala.m citta.m pariyaadaaya ti.t.theyya. yopi nesa.m assa carimo aalopo carima.m kaba.la.m, tatopi na asa.mvibhajitvaa bhu~njeyyu.m, sace nesa.m pa.tiggaahakaa assu. yasmaa ca kho, bhikkhave, sattaa ^a^P0.0019^ea^ na eva.m jaananti daanasa.mvibhaagassa vipaaka.m yathaaha.m jaanaami, tasmaa adatvaa bhu~njanti, maccheramala~nca nesa.m citta.m ^a^T0.0244^ea^ pariyaadaaya ti.t.thatii''ti. etamattha.m bhagavaa avoca. tattheta.m iti vuccati --
[22] dajju.m kaalena ariyesu, yattha dinna.m mahapphala.m..
[22] ito cutaa manussattaa, sagga.m gacchanti daayakaa..
[21] ``te ^a^V0.0016^ea^ ca saggagataa {sagga.m gataa (sii0 pii0 ka0)} tattha, modanti kaamakaamino.
[03] ayampi attho vutto bhagavataa, iti me sutanti. cha.t.tha.m.

[03] ``yaani kaanici, bhikkhave, opadhikaani pu~n~nakiriyavatthuuni sabbaani taani mettaaya cetovimuttiyaa kala.m naagghanti so.lasi.m. mettaayeva taani cetovimutti adhiggahetvaa bhaasate ca tapate ca virocati ca.

[03] ``seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, yaa kaaci taarakaruupaana.m pabhaa sabbaa taa ^a^P0.0020^ea^ candiyaa pabhaaya kala.m naagghanti so.lasi.m, candapabhaayeva taa adhiggahetvaa bhaasate ca tapate ca virocati ca; evameva kho, bhikkhave, yaani kaanici opadhikaani pu~n~nakiriyavatthuuni sabbaani taani mettaaya cetovimuttiyaa kala.m naagghanti so.lasi.m, mettaayeva taani cetovimutti ^a^T0.0245^ea^ adhiggahetvaa bhaasate ca tapate ca virocati ca.

[03] ``seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, vassaana.m pacchime maase saradasamaye viddhe vigatavalaahake deve {nabhe (sii0)} aadicco nabha.m abbhussakkamaano {abbhuggamamaano (ka0 a.t.tha0)} sabba.m aakaasagata.m {aakaasa.m (syaa0)} tamagata.m abhivihacca {abhihacca (syaa0)} bhaasate ca tapate ca virocati ca; evameva kho, bhikkhave, yaani kaanici opadhikaani pu~n~nakiriyavatthuuni sabbaani taani mettaaya cetovimuttiyaa kala.m naagghanti so.lasi.m, mettaayeva taani cetovimutti adhiggahetvaa bhaasate ca tapate ca virocati ca.

[01] ``seyyathaapi ^a^M0.0209^ea^, bhikkhave, rattiyaa paccuusasamaya.m osadhitaarakaa bhaasate ca tapate ca virocati ca; evameva kho, bhikkhave, yaani kaanici opadhikaani pu~n~nakiriyavatthuuni sabbaani taani mettaaya cetovimuttiyaa kala.m naagghanti so.lasi.m ^a^P0.0021^ea^, mettaayeva taani cetovimutti adhiggahetvaa bhaasate ca tapate ca virocati caa''ti. etamattha.m bhagavaa avoca. tattheta.m iti vuccati --
[21] ``ekampi ce paa.namadu.t.thacitto, mettaayati kusalo tena hoti.
[22] sabbe ca paa.ne manasaanukampa.m, pahuutamariyo pakaroti pu~n~na.m..
[21] ``mettassa cittassa subhaavitassa, kalampi te naanubhavanti so.lasi.m.
[21] ``yo na hanti na ghaateti, na jinaati na jaapaye.
[22] metta.mso sabbabhuutesu, vera.m tassa na kenacii''ti..
[03] ayampi attho vutto bhagavataa, iti me sutanti. sattama.m.
[21] citta.m ^a^M0.0210^ea^ metta.m {jhaayii (sii0 syaa0), jhaayi (pii0 ka0)} ubho atthe, pu~nja.m vepullapabbata.m.
[22] sampajaanamusaavaado, daana~nca mettabhaavanaa {mettabhaava~nca (sii0 syaa0 pii0), mettavaaca~nca (ka0)}..
[21] sattimaani ca {sattimaanidha (sii0 ka0)} suttaani, purimaani ca viisati.

[03] ``tayome, bhikkhave, puggalaa santo sa.mvijjamaanaa lokasmi.m. katame tayo? avu.t.thikasamo ^a^T0.0281^ea^, padesavassii, sabbatthaabhivassii.

[03] ``katha~nca ^a^M0.0240^ea^, bhikkhave, puggalo avu.t.thikasamo hoti? idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo sabbesa~n~neva na daataa hoti, sama.nabraahma.nakapa.naddhikavanibbakayaacakaana.m {... va.nibbakayaacakaana.m (sii0)} anna.m paana.m vattha.m yaana.m maalaagandhavilepana.m ^a^P0.0065^ea^ seyyaavasathapadiipeyya.m. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, puggalo avu.t.thikasamo hoti.

[03] ``katha~nca, bhikkhave, puggalo padesavassii hoti? idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo ekaccaana.m daataa (hoti) {( ) natthi syaamapotthake}, ekaccaana.m na daataa hoti sama.nabraahma.nakapa.naddhikavanibbakayaacakaana.m anna.m paana.m vattha.m yaana.m maalaagandhavilepana.m seyyaavasathapadiipeyya.m. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, puggalo padesavassii hoti.

[03] ``katha~nca, bhikkhave, puggalo sabbatthaabhivassii hoti? idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo sabbesa.mva deti, sama.nabraahma.nakapa.naddhikavanibbakayaacakaana.m anna.m paana.m vattha.m yaana.m maalaagandhavilepana.m seyyaavasathapadiipeyya.m. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, puggalo sabbatthaabhivassii hoti. ime ^a^V0.0049^ea^ kho, bhikkhave, tayo puggalaa santo sa.mvijjamaanaa lokasmi''nti. etamattha.m bhagavaa avoca. tattheta.m iti vuccati --
[22] ta.m ve avu.t.thikasamoti, aahu na.m purisaadhama.m..
[22] ta.m ve padesavassiiti, aahu medhaavino janaa..
[03] ayampi attho vutto bhagavataa, iti me sutanti. cha.t.tha.m.

[03] ``tii.nimaani, bhikkhave, sukhaani patthayamaano siila.m rakkheyya pa.n.dito. katamaani tii.ni? pasa.msaa me aagacchatuuti {aagacchantuuti (syaa0)} siila.m rakkheyya pa.n.dito, bhogaa me uppajjantuuti siila.m rakkheyya pa.n.dito, kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa sugati.m sagga.m loka.m upapajjissaamiiti siila.m rakkheyya pa.n.dito. imaani kho, bhikkhave, tii.ni sukhaani patthayamaano siila.m rakkheyya pa.n.dito''ti. etamattha.m bhagavaa avoca. tattheta.m iti vuccati --
[22] sa"nkiyo hoti paapasmi.m, ava.n.no cassa ruuhati..
[22] sa ^a^P0.0068^ea^ ve taadisako hoti, sahavaaso hi {sahavaasopi (sii0 ka0)} taadiso..
[22] asanto niraya.m nenti, santo paapenti suggati''nti..
[03] ayampi attho vutto bhagavataa, iti me sutanti. sattama.m.

[03] ``bhiduraaya.m {bhindantaaya.m (syaa0 pii0 ka0)}, bhikkhave, kaayo, vi~n~naa.na.m viraagadhamma.m, sabbe upadhii aniccaa dukkhaa vipari.naamadhammaa''ti. etamattha.m bhagavaa avoca. tattheta.m iti vuccati --
[21] ``kaaya~nca ^a^V0.0051^ea^ bhidura.m {bhindanta.m (syaa0 pii0 ka0)} ~natvaa, vi~n~naa.na~nca viraaguna.m {viraagika.m (ka0 sii0), pabha"ngu.na.m (syaa0)}.
[22] sampatvaa parama.m santi.m, kaala.m ka"nkhati bhaavitatto''ti..
[03] ayampi attho vutto bhagavataa, iti me sutanti. a.t.thama.m.

[03] ``dhaatuso, bhikkhave, sattaa sattehi saddhi.m sa.msandanti samenti. hiinaadhimuttikaa sattaa hiinaadhimuttikehi sattehi saddhi.m sa.msandanti samenti, kalyaa.naadhimuttikaa sattaa kalyaa.naadhimuttikehi sattehi saddhi.m sa.msandanti samenti.

[03] ``etarahipi, bhikkhave, paccuppana.m addhaana.m dhaatusova sattaa sattehi saddhi.m sa.msandanti samenti. hiinaadhimuttikaa sattaa hiinaadhimuttikehi sattehi saddhi.m sa.msandanti samenti, kalyaa.naadhimuttikaa sattaa kalyaa.naadhimuttikehi sattehi saddhi.m sa.msandanti samentii''ti. etamattha.m bhagavaa avoca. tattheta.m iti vuccati --
[03] ayampi attho vutto bhagavataa, iti me sutanti. navama.m.

[03] ``tayome, bhikkhave, dhammaa sekhassa bhikkhuno parihaanaaya sa.mvattanti. katame tayo? idha, bhikkhave, sekho bhikkhu kammaaraamo hoti, kammarato, kammaaraamatamanuyutto; bhassaaraamo hoti, bhassarato, bhassaaraamatamanuyutto; niddaaraamo hoti, niddaarato, niddaaraamatamanuyutto. ime kho, bhikkhave, tayo dhammaa sekhassa bhikkhuno parihaanaaya sa.mvattanti.

[03] ``tayome, bhikkhave, dhammaa sekhassa bhikkhuno aparihaanaaya sa.mvattanti. katame tayo? idha, bhikkhave, sekho bhikkhu na kammaaraamo hoti, na kammarato, na kammaaraamatamanuyutto; na bhassaaraamo hoti, na bhassarato, na bhassaaraamatamanuyutto; na niddaaraamo hoti, na niddaarato ^a^M0.0244^ea^ ^a^P0.0072^ea^, na niddaaraamatamanuyutto. ime kho, bhikkhave, tayo dhammaa sekhassa bhikkhuno aparihaanaaya sa.mvattantii''ti. etamattha.m bhagavaa avoca. tattheta.m iti vuccati --
[22] bhabbo so taadiso bhikkhu, phu.t.thu.m sambodhimuttama''nti..
[03] ayampi ^a^V0.0053^ea^ attho vutto bhagavataa, iti me sutanti. dasama.m.
[21] dve di.t.thii nissara.na.m ruupa.m, putto avu.t.thikena ca.

[03] ``di.t.thaa ^a^V0.0054^ea^ ^a^T0.0287^ea^ mayaa, bhikkhave, sattaa sakkaarena abhibhuutaa, pariyaadinnacittaa, kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa apaaya.m duggati.m vinipaata.m niraya.m upapannaa.

[03] ``tayome, bhikkhave, devesu devasaddaa niccharanti samayaa samaya.m upaadaaya. katame tayo? yasmi.m, bhikkhave, samaye ariyasaavako kesamassu.m ohaaretvaa kaasaayaani vatthaani acchaadetvaa agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajjaaya ceteti, tasmi.m samaye {tasmi.m bhikkhave samaye (pii0 ka0)} devesu devasaddo niccharati -- `eso ariyasaavako maarena saddhi.m sa"ngaamaaya cetetii'ti. aya.m, bhikkhave, pa.thamo devesu devasaddo niccharati samayaa samaya.m upaadaaya.

[03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, yasmi.m samaye ariyasaavako sattanna.m bodhipakkhiyaana.m dhammaana.m bhaavanaanuyogamanuyutto viharati, tasmi.m samaye devesu devasaddo niccharati -- `eso ariyasaavako maarena saddhi.m sa"ngaametii'ti. aya.m, bhikkhave, dutiyo devesu devasaddo niccharati samayaa samaya.m upaadaaya.

[03] ``yadaa, bhikkhave, devo devakaayaa cavanadhammo hoti, pa~ncassa pubbanimittaani paatubhavanti -- maalaa milaayanti, vatthaani kilissanti, kacchehi sedaa muccanti, kaaye dubba.n.niya.m okkamati, sake devo devaasane naabhiramatiiti. tamena.m, bhikkhave, devaa `cavanadhammo aya.m devaputto'ti iti viditvaa tiihi vaacaahi anumodenti {anumodanti (sii0 syaa0 pii0)} -- `ito, bho, sugati.m gaccha, sugati.m gantvaa ^a^P0.0077^ea^ suladdhalaabha.m labha, suladdhalaabha.m labhitvaa suppati.t.thito bhavaahii'''ti.

[03] ``manussatta.m kho, bhikkhu {bhikkhave (syaa0 pii0)}, devaana.m sugatigamanasa"nkhaata.m; ya.m manussabhuuto samaano tathaagatappavedite dhammavinaye saddha.m pa.tilabhati. ida.m kho, bhikkhu {bhikkhave (syaa0 pii0)}, devaana.m suladdhalaabhasa"nkhaata.m; saa kho panassa saddhaa nivi.t.thaa hoti muulajaataa pati.t.thitaa da.lhaa asa.mhaariyaa sama.nena vaa braahma.nena vaa devena vaa maarena vaa brahmunaa vaa kenaci vaa lokasmi.m. ida.m kho, bhikkhu {bhikkhave (syaa0 pii0)}, devaana.m suppati.t.thitasa"nkhaata''nti. etamattha.m bhagavaa avoca. tattheta.m iti vuccati --
[21] ```tato opadhika.m pu~n~na.m, katvaa daanena ta.m bahu.m.
[22] a~n~nepi macce saddhamme, brahmacariye nivesaya' {nivesaye (sii0 syaa0)}..
[03] ayampi attho vutto bhagavataa, iti me sutanti. catuttha.m.

[03] ``tayome puggalaa loke uppajjamaanaa uppajjanti bahujanahitaaya bahujanasukhaaya lokaanukampaaya atthaaya hitaaya sukhaaya devamanussaana.m. katame tayo? idha, bhikkhave, tathaagato loke uppajjati araha.m sammaasambuddho vijjaacara.nasampanno sugato lokaviduu anuttaro ^a^P0.0079^ea^ purisadammasaarathi satthaa devamanussaana.m buddho bhagavaa. so dhamma.m deseti aadikalyaa.na.m majjhekalyaa.na.m pariyosaanakalyaa.na.m saattha.m sabya~njana.m, kevalaparipu.n.na.m parisuddha.m brahmacariya.m pakaaseti. aya.m, bhikkhave, pa.thamo puggalo loke uppajjamaano uppajjati bahujanahitaaya bahujanasukhaaya lokaanukampaaya atthaaya hitaaya sukhaaya devamanussaana.m.

[03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, tasseva satthu saavako sekho hoti paa.tipado bahussuto siilavatuupapanno. sopi {so (?)} dhamma.m deseti aadikalyaa.na.m majjhekalyaa.na.m pariyosaanakalyaa.na.m ^a^T0.0292^ea^ saattha.m sabya~njana.m, kevalaparipu.n.na.m parisuddha.m brahmacariya.m pakaaseti. aya.m, bhikkhave, tatiyo puggalo loke uppajjamaano uppajjati bahujanahitaaya bahujanasukhaaya lokaanukampaaya atthaaya hitaaya sukhaaya devamanussaana.m. ime kho, bhikkhave, tayo puggalaa loke uppajjamaanaa uppajjanti bahujanahitaaya bahujanasukhaaya lokaanukampaaya atthaaya hitaaya sukhaaya devamanussaana''nti. etamattha.m bhagavaa avoca. tattheta.m iti vuccati --

[03] ``tayome, bhikkhave, kusalavitakkaa anandhakara.naa cakkhukara.naa ~naa.nakara.naa pa~n~naavuddhikaa avighaatapakkhikaa nibbaanasa.mvattanikaa. katame tayo? nekkhammavitakko, bhikkhave, anandhakara.no cakkhukara.no ~naa.nakara.no pa~n~naavuddhiko avighaatapakkhiko nibbaanasa.mvattaniko. abyaapaadavitakko, bhikkhave, anandhakara.no cakkhukara.no ~naa.nakara.no pa~n~naavuddhiko avighaatapakkhiko nibbaanasa.mvattaniko. avihi.msaavitakko, bhikkhave, anandhakara.no cakkhukara.no ~naa.nakara.no pa~n~naavuddhiko avighaatapakkhiko ^a^P0.0083^ea^ nibbaanasa.mvattaniko. ime kho, bhikkhave, tayo kusalavitakkaa anandhakara.naa cakkhukara.naa ~naa.nakara.naa pa~n~naavuddhikaa avighaatapakkhikaa nibbaanasa.mvattanikaa''ti. etamattha.m bhagavaa avoca. tattheta.m iti vuccati --
[21] ``tayo vitakke kusale vitakkaye, tayo ^a^T0.0295^ea^ pana akusale niraakare.
[27] sa ve vitakkaani vicaaritaani, sameti vu.t.thiiva raja.m samuuhata.m.
[22] sa ve vitakkuupasamena cetasaa, idheva so santipada.m samajjhagaa''ti..
[03] ayampi attho vutto bhagavataa, iti me sutanti. a.t.thama.m.

[03] ``tayome, bhikkhave, antaraamalaa antaraaamittaa antaraasapattaa antaraavadhakaa antaraapaccatthikaa. katame tayo? lobho, bhikkhave, antaraamalo antaraaamitto antaraasapatto ^a^V0.0061^ea^ antaraavadhako antaraapaccatthiko. doso, bhikkhave, antaraamalo antaraaamitto antaraasapatto antaraavadhako antaraapaccatthiko. moho, bhikkhave, antaraamalo antaraaamitto antaraasapatto antaraavadhako antaraapaccatthiko. ime kho, bhikkhave, tayo antaraamalaa antaraaamittaa antaraasapattaa antaraavadhakaa antaraapaccatthikaa''ti. etamattha.m bhagavaa avoca. tattheta.m iti vuccati --
[21] ``luddho ^a^P0.0084^ea^ attha.m na jaanaati, luddho dhamma.m na passati.
[22] andhatama.m {andha.m tama.m (sii0)} tadaa hoti, ya.m lobho sahate nara.m..
[21] ``yo ca lobha.m pahantvaana, lobhaneyye na lubbhati.
[21] ``du.t.tho attha.m na jaanaati, du.t.tho dhamma.m na passati.
[22] andhatama.m tadaa hoti, ya.m doso sahate nara.m..
[21] ``yo ca dosa.m pahantvaana, dosaneyye na dussati.
[21] ``muu.lho attha.m na jaanaati, muu.lho dhamma.m na passati.
[22] andhatama.m tadaa hoti, ya.m moho sahate nara.m..
[21] ``yo ^a^M0.0253^ea^ ^a^V0.0062^ea^ ^a^P0.0085^ea^ ca moha.m pahantvaana, mohaneyye na muyhati.
[22] moha.m vihanti so sabba.m, aadiccovudaya.m tama''nti..
[03] ayampi attho vutto bhagavataa, iti me sutanti. navama.m.

[03] ``tiihi, bhikkhave, asaddhammehi abhibhuuto pariyaadinnacitto devadatto aapaayiko nerayiko kappa.t.tho atekiccho. katamehi tiihi? paapicchataaya, bhikkhave, abhibhuuto pariyaadinnacitto devadatto aapaayiko nerayiko kappa.t.tho atekiccho. paapamittataaya, bhikkhave, abhibhuuto pariyaadinnacitto devadatto aapaayiko nerayiko kappa.t.tho atekiccho. sati kho pana uttarikara.niiye {uttari.m kara.niiye (syaa0)} oramattakena visesaadhigamena {visesaadhigamena ca (syaa0 pii0)} antaraa vosaana.m aapaadi. imehi kho, bhikkhave, tiihi asaddhammehi abhibhuuto pariyaadinnacitto devadatto aapaayiko nerayiko ^a^T0.0297^ea^ kappa.t.tho atekiccho''ti. etamattha.m bhagavaa avoca. tattheta.m iti vuccati --
[22] jala.mva yasasaa a.t.thaa, devadattoti vissuto {me suta.m (paa.liya.m)}..
[21] ``so pamaa.namanuci.n.no {pamaadamanuci.n.no (ka0 sii0 syaa0 pii0), samaanamanuci.n.no (a.t.tha0)}, aasajja na.m tathaagata.m.
[22] na so tena paduuseyya, bhesmaa hi udadhi mahaa..
[22] sammaggata.m ^a^P0.0087^ea^ {samaggata.m (sii0 ka0)} santacitta.m, vaado tamhi na ruuhati..
[22] yassa maggaanugo bhikkhu, khaya.m dukkhassa paapu.ne''ti..
[03] ayampi attho vutto bhagavataa, iti me sutanti. dasama.m.

[03] ``tayome, bhikkhave, aggappasaadaa. katame tayo? yaavataa, bhikkhave, sattaa apadaa vaa dvipadaa vaa catuppadaa vaa bahuppadaa {bahupadaa (ka0)} vaa ruupino vaa aruupino vaa sa~n~nino vaa asa~n~nino vaa nevasa~n~ninaasa~n~nino vaa, tathaagato tesa.m aggamakkhaayati araha.m sammaasambuddho ^a^P0.0088^ea^. ye, bhikkhave, buddhe pasannaa, agge te pasannaa. agge kho pana pasannaana.m aggo vipaako hoti.

[03] ``yaavataa, bhikkhave, dhammaa sa"nkhataa vaa asa"nkhataa vaa, viraago tesa.m aggamakkhaayati, yadida.m madanimmadano pipaasavinayo aalayasamugghaato va.t.tupacchedo ta.nhakkhayo viraago nirodho nibbaana.m. ye, bhikkhave, viraage dhamme pasannaa, agge te pasannaa. agge kho pana pasannaana.m aggo vipaako hoti.

[03] ``yaavataa ^a^V0.0064^ea^, bhikkhave, sa"nghaa vaa ga.naa vaa, tathaagatasaavakasa"ngho tesa.m aggamakkhaayati, yadida.m cattaari purisayugaani a.t.tha purisapuggalaa ^a^T0.0299^ea^ esa ^a^M0.0255^ea^ bhagavato saavakasa"ngho aahuneyyo paahuneyyo dakkhi.neyyo a~njalikara.niiyo anuttara.m pu~n~nakkhetta.m lokassa. ye, bhikkhave, sa"nghe pasannaa, agge te pasannaa. agge kho pana pasannaana.m aggo vipaako hoti. ime kho, bhikkhave, tayo aggappasaadaa''ti. etamattha.m bhagavaa avoca. tattheta.m iti vuccati --
[22] agga.m aayu ca va.n.no ca, yaso kitti sukha.m bala.m..
[03] ayampi attho vutto bhagavataa, iti me sutanti. pa.thama.m.

[03] ``antamida.m, bhikkhave, jiivikaana.m yadida.m pi.n.dolya.m. abhisaapoya.m {abhisaapaaya.m (sii0), abhilaapaaya.m (syaa0 pii0), abhisapaaya.m (ka0)}, bhikkhave, lokasmi.m -- `pi.n.dolo vicarasi pattapaa.nii'ti. ta~nca kho eta.m, bhikkhave, kulaputtaa upenti atthavasikaa, atthavasa.m pa.ticca; neva raajaabhiniitaa, na coraabhiniitaa, na i.na.t.taa, na bhaya.t.taa, na aajiivikaapakataa. api ca kho `oti.n.namhaa jaatiyaa jaraaya mara.nena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upaayaasehi dukkhoti.n.naa dukkhaparetaa ^a^T0.0300^ea^, appeva naama imassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa antakiriyaa pa~n~naayethaa'ti. eva.m pabbajito caaya.m, bhikkhave, kulaputto so ^a^P0.0090^ea^ ca hoti abhijjhaalu kaamesu tibbasaaraago, byaapannacitto padu.t.thamanasa"nkappo, mu.t.thassati ^a^V0.0065^ea^ asampajaano asamaahito vibbhantacitto paakatindriyo. seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, chavaalaata.m ubhatopaditta.m majjhe guuthagata.m neva gaame ka.t.thattha.m pharati ^a^M0.0256^ea^ na ara~n~ne: tathuupamaaha.m, bhikkhave, ima.m puggala.m vadaami gihibhogaa parihiino saama~n~nattha~nca na paripuuretii''ti. etamattha.m bhagavaa avoca. tattheta.m iti vuccati --
[22] paapaa paapehi kammehi, niraya.m te upapajjare..
[03] ayampi attho vutto bhagavataa, iti me sutanti. dutiya.m.

[03] ``sa"nghaa.tika.n.ne cepi, bhikkhave ^a^P0.0091^ea^, bhikkhu gahetvaa pi.t.thito pi.t.thito anubandho assa paade paada.m nikkhipanto, so ca hoti abhijjhaalu kaamesu tibbasaaraago byaapannacitto padu.t.thamanasa"nkappo mu.t.thassati asampajaano asamaahito vibbhantacitto paakatindriyo; atha kho so aarakaava mayha.m, aha~nca tassa. ta.m kissa hetu? dhamma~nhi so, bhikkhave, bhikkhu na passati. dhamma.m apassanto ^a^T0.0301^ea^ na ma.m passati {ma.m na passati (syaa0)}.

[03] ``yojanasate cepi so, bhikkhave, bhikkhu vihareyya. so ca hoti anabhijjhaalu kaamesu na tibbasaaraago abyaapannacitto apadu.t.thamanasa"nkappo upa.t.thitassati sampajaano samaahito ekaggacitto sa.mvutindriyo; atha kho so santikeva mayha.m, aha~nca tassa. ta.m kissa hetu? dhamma.m hi so, bhikkhave, bhikkhu passati; dhamma.m passanto ma.m passatii''ti. etamattha.m bhagavaa avoca. tattheta.m iti vuccati --
[22] giddho so viitagedhassa, passa yaava~nca aarakaa..
[03] ayampi attho vutto bhagavataa, iti me sutanti. tatiya.m.
[03] ``tayome, bhikkhave, aggii. katame tayo? raagaggi, dosaggi, mohaggi -- ime kho, bhikkhave, tayo aggii''ti. etamattha.m bhagavaa avoca. tattheta.m iti vuccati --
[03] ayampi attho vutto bhagavataa, iti me sutanti. catuttha.m.

[03] ``tathaa tathaa, bhikkhave, bhikkhu upaparikkheyya ^a^P0.0094^ea^ yathaa yathaassa {yathaa yathaa (bahuusu)} upaparikkhato bahiddhaa cassa vi~n~naa.na.m avikkhitta.m avisa.ta.m ajjhatta.m asa.n.thita.m anupaadaaya na paritasseyya. bahiddhaa, bhikkhave, vi~n~naa.ne avikkhitte avisa.te sati ajjhatta.m asa.n.thite anupaadaaya aparitassato aayati.m jaatijaraamara.nadukkhasamudayasambhavo na hotii''ti. etamattha.m bhagavaa avoca. tattheta.m iti vuccati --
[03] ayampi attho vutto bhagavataa, iti me sutanti. pa~ncama.m.

[03] ``tisso imaa, bhikkhave, kaamuupapattiyo {kaamuppattiyo (sii0)}. katamaa tisso? paccupa.t.thitakaamaa, nimmaanaratino ^a^V0.0068^ea^, paranimmitavasavattino -- imaa kho, bhikkhave, tisso kaamuupapattiyo''ti. etamattha.m bhagavaa avoca. tattheta.m iti vuccati --
[22] sabbe pariccaje kaame, ye dibbaa ye ca maanusaa..
[03] ayampi attho vutto bhagavataa, iti me sutanti. cha.t.tha.m.

[03] ``kaamayogayutto, bhikkhave, bhavayogayutto aagaamii hoti aagantaa {aagantvaa (syaa0 ka0)} itthatta.m. kaamayogavisa.myutto, bhikkhave, bhavayogayutto anaagaamii hoti anaagantaa itthatta.m. kaamayogavisa.myutto, bhikkhave, bhavayogavisa.myutto arahaa hoti, khii.naasavo''ti. etamattha.m bhagavaa avoca. tattheta.m iti vuccati --
[22] te ve paara"ngataa loke, ye pattaa aasavakkhaya''nti..
[03] ayampi attho vutto bhagavataa, iti me sutanti. sattama.m.
[03] ``kalyaa.nasiilo, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kalyaa.nadhammo kalyaa.napa~n~no imasmi.m dhammavinaye `kevalii vusitavaa uttamapuriso'ti vuccati --

[03] ``katha~nca ^a^T0.0304^ea^, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kalyaa.nasiilo hoti? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu siilavaa hoti, paatimokkhasa.mvarasa.mvuto viharati, aacaaragocarasampanno a.numattesu vajjesu bhayadassaavii, samaadaaya sikkhati sikkhaapadesu. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kalyaa.nasiilo hoti. iti kalyaa.nasiilo.

[03] ``kalyaa.nadhammo ^a^M0.0260^ea^ ca katha.m hoti? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sattanna.m bodhipakkhiyaana.m dhammaana.m bhaavanaanuyogamanuyutto viharati. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kalyaa.nadhammo hoti. iti kalyaa.nasiilo, kalyaa.nadhammo.

[03] ``kalyaa.napa~n~no ca katha.m hoti ^a^P0.0097^ea^? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu aasavaana.m khayaa anaasava.m cetovimutti.m pa~n~naavimutti.m di.t.theva dhamme saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja viharati. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kalyaa.napa~n~no hoti.
[03] ``iti kalyaa.nasiilo kalyaa.nadhammo kalyaa.napa~n~no imasmi.m dhammavinaye `kevalii vusitavaa uttamapuriso'ti vuccatii''ti. etamattha.m bhagavaa avoca. tattheta.m iti vuccati --
[22] ta.m ve kalyaa.nasiiloti, aahu bhikkhu.m hiriimana.m {hiriimata.m (syaa0 ka0)}..
[22] ta.m ve kalyaa.nadhammoti, aahu bhikkhu.m anussada.m..
[22] ta.m ve kalyaa.napa~n~noti, aahu bhikkhu.m anaasava.m..
[03] ayampi attho vutto bhagavataa, iti me sutanti. a.t.thama.m.
[03] ``dvemaani ^a^P0.0098^ea^, bhikkhave, daanaani -- aamisadaana~nca dhammadaana~nca. etadagga.m, bhikkhave, imesa.m dvinna.m daanaana.m yadida.m -- dhammadaana.m.
[03] ``dveme, bhikkhave, sa.mvibhaagaa -- aamisasa.mvibhaago ca dhammasa.mvibhaago ca. etadagga.m, bhikkhave, imesa.m dvinna.m sa.mvibhaagaana.m yadida.m -- dhammasa.mvibhaago.

[03] ``dveme ^a^M0.0261^ea^, bhikkhave, anuggahaa -- aamisaanuggaho ca dhammaanuggaho ca. etadagga.m, bhikkhave, imesa.m dvinna.m anuggahaana.m yadida.m -- dhammaanuggaho''ti. etamattha.m bhagavaa avoca. tattheta.m iti vuccati --
[21] ``yamaahu daana.m parama.m anuttara.m, ya.m sa.mvibhaaga.m bhagavaa ava.n.nayi {ava.n.nayii (sii0)}.
[22] aggamhi khettamhi pasannacitto, vi~n~nuu pajaana.m ko na yajetha kaale..
[21] ``ye ^a^V0.0071^ea^ ceva bhaasanti su.nanti cuubhaya.m, pasannacittaa sugatassa saasane.
[22] tesa.m so attho paramo visujjhati, ye appamattaa sugatassa saasane''ti..
[03] ayampi attho vutto bhagavataa, iti me sutanti. navama.m.
[01] ``dhammenaaha.m, bhikkhave, tevijja.m braahma.na.m pa~n~naapemi, naa~n~na.m lapitalaapanamattena.

[03] ``katha~ncaaha.m, bhikkhave, dhammena tevijja.m braahma.na.m pa~n~naapemi, naa~n~na.m lapitalaapanamattena? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu anekavihita.m pubbenivaasa.m anussarati, seyyathida.m ^a^P0.0099^ea^ -- ekampi ^a^T0.0306^ea^ jaati.m dvepi jaatiyo tissopi jaatiyo catassopi jaatiyo pa~ncapi jaatiyo dasapi jaatiyo viisampi jaatiyo ti.msampi jaatiyo cattaaliisampi jaatiyo pa~n~naasampi jaatiyo jaatisatampi jaatisahassampi jaatisatasahassampi anekepi sa.mva.t.takappe anekepi viva.t.takappe anekepi sa.mva.t.taviva.t.takappe -- `amutraasi.m eva.mnaamo eva.mgotto eva.mva.n.no evamaahaaro eva.msukhadukkhappa.tisa.mvedii evamaayupariyanto. so tato cuto amutra udapaadi.m. tatraapaasi.m eva.mnaamo eva.mgotto eva.mva.n.no evamaahaaro eva.msukhadukkhappa.tisa.mvedii evamaayupariyanto. so tato cuto idhuupapanno'ti ^a^M0.0262^ea^. iti saakaara.m sauddesa.m anekavihita.m pubbenivaasa.m anussarati. ayamassa pa.thamaa vijjaa adhigataa hoti, avijjaa vihataa, vijjaa uppannaa, tamo vihato, aaloko uppanno, yathaa ta.m appamattassa aataapino pahitattassa viharato.

[03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhu dibbena cakkhunaa visuddhena atikkantamaanusakena satte passati cavamaane upapajjamaane hiine pa.niite suva.n.ne dubba.n.ne, sugate duggate yathaakammuupage satte pajaanaati -- `ime vata bhonto sattaa kaayaduccaritena samannaagataa vaciiduccaritena samannaagataa manoduccaritena samannaagataa ariyaana.m upavaadakaa micchaadi.t.thikaa micchaadi.t.thikammasamaadaanaa. te kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa apaaya.m duggati.m vinipaata.m niraya.m upapannaa. ime vaa pana bhonto sattaa kaayasucaritena samannaagataa vaciisucaritena samannaagataa ^a^T0.0307^ea^ manosucaritena ^a^P0.0100^ea^ samannaagataa ariyaana.m anupavaadakaa sammaadi.t.thikaa sammaadi.t.thikammasamaadaanaa. te kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa sugati.m sagga.m loka.m upapannaa'ti. iti dibbena cakkhunaa visuddhena ^a^V0.0072^ea^ atikkantamaanusakena satte passati cavamaane upapajjamaane hiine pa.niite suva.n.ne dubba.n.ne, sugate duggate yathaakammuupage satte pajaanaati. ayamassa dutiyaa vijjaa adhigataa hoti, avijjaa vihataa, vijjaa uppannaa, tamo vihato, aaloko uppanno, yathaa ta.m appamattassa aataapino pahitattassa viharato.

[03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhu aasavaana.m khayaa anaasava.m cetovimutti.m pa~n~naavimutti.m di.t.theva dhamme saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja viharati. ayamassa tatiyaa vijjaa adhigataa hoti, avijjaa vihataa, vijjaa uppannaa, tamo vihato, aaloko uppanno, yathaa ta.m appamattassa aataapino pahitattassa viharato. eva.m kho aha.m, bhikkhave, dhammena tevijja.m braahma.na.m pa~n~naapemi, naa~n~na.m lapitalaapanamattenaa''ti. etamattha.m bhagavaa avoca. tattheta.m iti vuccati --
[22] atho {atha (syaa0 ka0)} jaatikkhaya.m patto, abhi~n~naavosito muni..
[03] ayampi attho vutto bhagavataa, iti me sutanti. dasama.m.
[22] upapatti {uppatti (sii0)} kaama kalyaa.na.m, daana.m dhammena te dasaati..

[03] ``ahamasmi, bhikkhave, braahma.no yaacayogo sadaa payatapaa.ni {payatapaa.nii (sii0 syaa0)} antimadehadharo anuttaro bhisakko sallakatto. tassa me tumhe puttaa orasaa mukhato jaataa dhammajaa dhammanimmitaa dhammadaayaadaa, no aamisadaayaadaa.
[03] ``dvemaani, bhikkhave, daanaani -- aamisadaana~nca ^a^P0.0102^ea^ dhammadaana~nca. etadagga.m, bhikkhave, imesa.m dvinna.m daanaana.m yadida.m -- dhammadaana.m.
[03] ``dveme, bhikkhave, sa.mvibhaagaa -- aamisasa.mvibhaago ca dhammasa.mvibhaago ca. etadagga.m, bhikkhave, imesa.m dvinna.m sa.mvibhaagaana.m yadida.m -- dhammasa.mvibhaago.
[03] ``dveme, bhikkhave, anuggahaa -- aamisaanuggaho ca dhammaanuggaho ca. etadagga.m, bhikkhave, imesa.m dvinna.m anuggahaana.m yadida.m -- dhammaanuggaho.
[03] ``dveme, bhikkhave, yaagaa -- aamisayaago ca dhammayaago ca. etadagga.m, bhikkhave, imesa.m dvinna.m yaagaana.m yadida.m -- dhammayaago''ti. etamattha.m bhagavaa avoca. tattheta.m iti vuccati --
[21] ``yo ^a^T0.0309^ea^ dhammayaaga.m ayajii amaccharii, tathaagato sabbabhuutaanukampii {sabbasattaanukampii (syaa0) a.t.thakathaayampi}.
[22] ta.m taadisa.m devamanussase.t.tha.m, sattaa namassanti bhavassa paaragu''nti..
[03] ayampi attho vutto bhagavataa, iti me sutanti. pa.thama.m.

[03] ``cattaarimaani, bhikkhave, appaani ceva sulabhaani ca, taani ca anavajjaani. katamaani cattaari? pa.msukuula.m, bhikkhave, ciivaraana.m appa~nca sulabha~nca, ta~nca anavajja.m. pi.n.diyaalopo ^a^M0.0265^ea^, bhikkhave, bhojanaana.m appa~nca sulabha~nca, ta~nca anavajja.m. rukkhamuula.m, bhikkhave ^a^P0.0103^ea^, senaasanaana.m appa~nca sulabha~nca, ta~nca anavajja.m. puutimutta.m, bhikkhave, bhesajjaana.m appa~nca sulabha~nca ta~nca anavajja.m. imaani kho, bhikkhave, cattaari appaani ceva sulabhaani ca, taani ca anavajjaani. yato kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu appena ca tu.t.tho hoti sulabhena ca (anavajjena ca) {(...) natthi sii0 pii0 ka0 potthakesu ca a"nguttare ca}, imassaaha.m a~n~natara.m saama~n~na"nganti vadaamii''ti. etamattha.m bhagavaa avoca. tattheta.m iti vuccati --
[03] ayampi attho vutto bhagavataa, iti me sutanti. dutiya.m.

[03] ``jaanatoha.m, bhikkhave, passato aasavaana.m khaya.m vadaami ^a^T0.0310^ea^, no ajaanato no apassato. ki~nca, bhikkhave, jaanato, ki.m passato aasavaana.m khayo hoti? ida.m dukkhanti, bhikkhave, jaanato passato aasavaana.m khayo ^a^P0.0104^ea^ hoti. aya.m dukkhasamudayoti, bhikkhave, jaanato passato aasavaana.m khayo hoti. aya.m dukkhanirodhoti, bhikkhave, jaanato passato aasavaana.m khayo hoti. aya.m dukkhanirodhagaaminii pa.tipadaati, bhikkhave, jaanato passato aasavaana.m khayo hoti. eva.m kho ^a^V0.0075^ea^, bhikkhave, jaanato eva.m passato aasavaana.m khayo hotii''ti. etamattha.m bhagavaa avoca. tattheta.m iti vuccati --
[03] ayampi attho vutto bhagavataa, iti me sutanti. tatiya.m.

[03] ``ye hi keci, bhikkhave, sama.naa vaa braahma.naa ^a^P0.0105^ea^ vaa `ida.m dukkha'nti yathaabhuuta.m nappajaananti; `aya.m dukkhasamudayo'ti yathaabhuuta.m nappajaananti; `aya.m dukkhanirodho'ti yathaabhuuta.m nappajaananti; `aya.m dukkhanirodhagaaminii pa.tipadaa'ti yathaabhuuta.m nappajaananti -- na me te, bhikkhave, sama.naa vaa braahma.naa vaa sama.nesu vaa sama.nasammataa braahma.nesu vaa braahma.nasammataa, na ca panete aayasmanto saama~n~nattha.m vaa brahma~n~nattha.m vaa di.t.theva dhamme saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa ^a^T0.0311^ea^ upasampajja viharanti.

[03] ``ye ca kho keci, bhikkhave, sama.naa vaa braahma.naa vaa `ida.m dukkha'nti yathaabhuuta.m pajaananti; `aya.m dukkhasamudayo'ti yathaabhuuta.m pajaananti; `aya.m dukkhanirodho'ti yathaabhuuta.m pajaananti; `aya.m dukkhanirodhagaaminii pa.tipadaa'ti yathaabhuuta.m pajaananti -- te kho me, bhikkhave, sama.naa vaa braahma.naa vaa sama.nesu ceva sama.nasammataa braahma.nesu ca braahma.nasammataa, te ca panaayasmanto saama~n~nattha~nca brahma~n~nattha~nca di.t.theva dhamme saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja viharantii''ti. etamattha.m bhagavaa avoca. tattheta.m iti vuccati --
[27] yattha ca sabbaso dukkha.m, asesa.m uparujjhati.
[22] abhabbaa te antakiriyaaya, te ve jaatijaruupagaa..
[21] ``ye ^a^M0.0267^ea^ ca dukkha.m pajaananti, atho dukkhassa sambhava.m.
[27] yattha ca sabbaso dukkha.m, asesa.m uparujjhati.
